elements.name: email
elements.title: A google account is needed for today’s study. Click on the sign in button at the top right part of the chrome page, and sign in / create a new account. When you are done, please enter your new email address below.

elements.name: question8
elements.html:
Find your user id on the top right of this site:

It should look like a city name + today's date, such as: raleigh1022

This is your unique user ID. To protect your privacy, please use this user id, not your own name, to sign up to all softwares that we will use today.

elements.name: user_id
elements.title: Please type your unique user ID below to confirm that you have understood to use this user id, NOT your own name, to sign up to all softwares that we will use today.

elements.name: question2
elements.html: Please create your personal folder in this Google Drive link https://go.ncsu.edu/stars-submit. Your folder should be named under your unique user ID (e.g., raleigh1022).

elements.name: confirm_folder_created
elements.title: When you are done, please confirm:

choices.text: I confirm that I have created my personal folder using my unique user ID.

elements.name: have_completed_ap
elements.title: Have you completed any AP Computer Science classes in high school?

choices.text: I have not completed any AP Computer Science classes in high school.

elements.name: worked_with_snap
elements.title: Have you ever worked with the Scratch or Snap! programming environments?

choices.text: Yes, more than a few times
No, but I've worked with another similar environment

elements.name: self_rate_prior_experience
elements.title: How would you rate your prior experience with programming?

choices.text: I don't have any programming experience.
I have completed a few programming tutorials before (e.g. an Hour of Code activity).
I've taken one course in programming.
I've taken two courses in programming.
I've taken more than two courses in programming.

pages.name: page3

elements.name: question6
elements.html:
Go to https://go.ncsu.edu/stars-slides and you will see a page below

Fill in your box with: your name, and 3 of your favorite animals/sports/food/anything. - You can download icons from this site

choices.text: I confirm that I have finished drawing my own self-introduction box

pages.title: Draw your own box on the self-introduction board
